errorDescription: Make sure no stem was recorded more than once
errorMessage: There are duplicated stems

errorDescription: Make sure no stem were missed in the quadrats already censused
errorMessage: Some stems were missed

errorDescription: Check for diameters that decrease too much
errorMessage: Some diameters seem too small

errorDescription: Check for diameters that increase too much
errorMessage: Some diameters seem too big

errorDescription: Check for that Code A means a different POM than 1.30
errorMessage: Some diameters seem too big

errorDescription: Check that all DBH were measured
errorMessage: Some DBH were not measured

currentTableFilter: dbh_current %in% 0 & !grepl('\\<C\\>|\\<X\\>', codes_current) & !grepl('D', status_current) & !grepl('Stem inaccessible', notes_current, ignore.case = T)
errorDescription: Check that dbh=0 is justified by X or C in codes
errorMessage: Some DBH = 0 are not justified

errorDescription: Check that crown position was recorded if status is A, or DS
errorMessage: Some crown positions are missing

currentTableFilter: ((status_previous %in% c('D','G', 'stem dead','broken below','dead') & status_current %in% c('LI')) | (status_2022 %in% c('DS', 'DC') & status_current %in% c('LI')))  & !grepl('SV', codes_current)
errorDescription: Check if tree was found alive after being recorded as dead
errorMessage: Some stems were found alive after beeing dead

currentTableFilter: ((status_previous %in% 'broken below' & status_current %in% c('DS')) | (status_2022 %in% 'DC' & status_current %in% c('DS'))) & !grepl('SV', codes_current)
errorDescription: Check that no down tree is back standing
errorMessage: Some dead and down are noe dead standing

errorDescription: Check that percent crown intact was recorded if status is A, AU or DS
errorMessage: Some percent crown intact are missing

errorDescription: Check that percent crown living was recorded if status is A, AU
errorMessage: Some percent crown living are missing

errorDescription: Check that percent crown living is 0 if tree is dead
errorMessage: Some crown living are not zero for dead stems

errorDescription: Check that percent crown living is smaller than percent crown intact
errorMessage: Some percent crown living are larger than percent crown intact

errorDescription: Check that status is AU when obvious signs of health issues
errorMessage: Some trees are A while they have obvious signs of unhealthyness

errorDescription: Check that if status is A or AU, dead with resprout is not TRUE
errorMessage: Some A or AU are "Dead with resprout"

errorDescription: Check that if status is  AU, DS or DC, there is a fad justifying it
errorMessage: Some FAD are missing

errorDescription: Check that there is a wound level when W in FAD
errorMessage: Some wound level are missing

errorDescription: Check that there is a W in FAD if a there is wound level
errorMessage: Some trees with a wound level don't have a W in FAD

errorDescription: Check that there is a canker_swelling_deformity level when K in FAD
errorMessage: Some canker level are missing

errorDescription: Check that there is a K in FAD if a there is canker_swelling_deformity  level
errorMessage: Some trees with a canker level don't have a K in FAD

errorDescription: Check that there is a rot level when R in FAD
errorMessage: Some rot level are missing

errorDescription: Check that there is a R in FAD if a there is rot level
errorMessage: Some trees with a rot level don't have a R in FAD

errorDescription: Check if there is NA in the quadrats
errorMessage: Some stems don't have a quadrat
